div.p: GTB was responsible for designing the study, developing the Norwegian translated version of the SAQ-A questionnaire, data collection, analysis and interpretation of data, and writing the manuscript. DH participated in developing the Norwegian SAQ-A questionnaire, and was responsible for the statistical analysis and interpretation of results, in addition to critically revising the manuscript. BSH participated in adapting the SAQ-A questionnaire to the Norwegian nursing home setting, writing and critically revising the manuscript. ECTD participated in designing the study, developing the Norwegian SAQ-A questionnaire, data analyses and interpretation, and writing the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.p: GTB, MD and PhD, is Professor in General Practice at the University of Bergen, and Principal Researcher at the National Centre for Emergency Primary Health Care, NORCE Norwegian Research Centre, Bergen, Norway. He is a specialist in family medicine, and works clinically as a general practitioner in Bømlo, Norway.
DH is Professor at Lovisenberg Diaconal University College, Oslo, Norway. He is a social scientist.

BSH, MD and PhD, is Professor in Elderly Medicine at the University of Bergen, Head of the Center for Elderly and Nursing Home Medicine, and senior researcher at the Municipality of Bergen, Norway. She is a specialist in anesthesia, nursing home medicine, and palliative medicine.

ECTD, MD and PhD, is a Senior Researcher at the Health Services Research Unit at Akershus University Hospital and a Senior Advisor for the Norwegian Directorate of Health, secretariat of the Norwegian patient safety programme. She is a consultant in internal medicine in an ambulatory clinic for rehabilitation of stroke patients, at Akershus University Hospital.
